title: Claimant pay details
subtitle: Pay details provided on ET1
payBeforeTaxLabel: Pay BEFORE tax and National Insurance
payAfterTaxLabel: Pay AFTER tax and National Insurance
label: Are the pay details given by the claimant correct?
noHintLabel: You will be able to enter correct pay details at the next step.
notSureHintLabel: If you select Not sure, you will not be able to enter pay details.
